Multi-Factor Authentication

Authentication is enhanced through multiple verification options to protect the security of data and application programs.

Apply for trial Purchase now

Azure Multi-Factor Authentication offers strict authentication through a series of simple authentication options, which include phone number, text message or notification on mobile application. Users can choose their preferred options.

Pricing Details

Azure Manager can enhance security defense against identity information through Azure Multi-Factor Authentication when logging into the management portal.

Multi-Factor Authentication service is free of charge for present.

FAQs

Expand all
  • Will my organization be charged for phone calls or text messages to the phone numbers for authentication of my users when Azure Multi-Factor Authentication is used?

    All cost will be counted into the “Based on User” or “Based on Authentication” cost of the service. When Azure Multi-Factor Authentication is used, your organization (deriving from ‘You’) will not charged for phone calls or text messages to the phone numbers for authentication of your final users. When receiving phone calls or text messages, phone operators may charge the phone number owner roaming fees or other fees.

Marketing Regions

Multi-Factor Authentication is available in the following regions:

Territories Regions
Mainland China China East Data Center, China North Data Center

Support and Service Level Agreements

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support and select self-help service or any other method to contact us for support.

We guarantee that the availability of Azure Multi-Factor Authentication is up to 99.9%.

A Service Level Agreement is not available in the free edition of the Multi-Factor Authentication.

To learn more about the details of our Service Level Agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreements page.
